name: Coca-Cola
description: A carbonated soft drink with a distinctive cola flavor, sweetened with sugar and/or artificial sweeteners

name: Coffee
description: A hot drink made from roasted and ground coffee beans, brewed with water and usually served with milk and sugar

name: Lemonade
description: A refreshing drink made from lemon juice, water and sugar, sometimes flavored with mint or other herbs

name: Chocolate Milkshake
description: A cold drink made from milk, chocolate ice cream and flavorings, blended together until smooth and frothy

name: Masala Chai
description: A hot and aromatic drink made with black tea, milk, sugar and a blend of spices such as cardamom, ginger, cloves and cinnamon

name: Lassi
description: A refreshing and creamy drink made with yogurt, water, sugar and sometimes fruits or spices

name: Aam Panna
description: A tangy and sweet drink made with boiled green mangoes, sugar, salt, roasted cumin and mint leaves

name: Jaljeera
description: A spicy and sour drink made with water, lemon juice, cumin, black salt, mint and other herbs

name: Thandai
description: A festive and cooling drink made with milk, almonds, pistachios, rose petals, saffron and a mix of spices
